metadata.title: Why has Nescafé Ice Java been discontinued

text: Unfortunately, our Nescafé’s Ice Java 470ml bottle has been discontinued and will no longer be produced.

We wish to thank you for your loyalty and interest in our products. The decision to discontinue a product is not an easy process and there are many different factors that determine which products are available within a certain market. The longevity of any of our products is driven by the feedback from our valuable consumers like yourself.
If you are looking for a coffee syrup recipe similar to Ice Java, you can visit:https://www.madewithnestle.ca/recipe/nescafe-ice-java-coffee-syrup
For our full product portfolio you can visit:https://www.madewithnestle.ca/nescafe
Should you wish to connect with us, we would happily take your feedback into consideration for any future product assessments.
Did you find this answer helpful?
Thank you for letting us know!
Please provide us with more details, including product information, and we'll be happy to help.
